title: missing template file for settings formfactor after upgrading from oc5 to 6
body:
### expected behaviour
after upgrading from the latest oc5 version to the newest oc6 version via debian-repo, i'll wanted to updated the apps in the administration-dialog.

### actual behaviour
after logged in with the administrative account and clicking into the "administration" section, i'll get this message:

template file not found: template:settings formfactor:

### steps to reproduce
1. login as root
2. user-dropdown menu
3. administration (https://$host/$owncloud_intance/index.php/settings/admin

results into the exepction.

### server configuration
operating system:
debian gnu/linux 7 \n \l

#### web server: 
apache2                               2.2.22-13                          amd64        apache http server metapackage

#### database:
mysql-server-5.5                      5.5.31+dfsg-0+wheezy1              amd64        mysql database server binaries and system database setup


#### php version:
php5                                  5.4.4-14+deb7u7                    all          server-side, html-embedded scripting language (metapackage)

owncloud version: (see owncloud admin page)
owncloud                              6.0.0a-0                           all          owncloud server - private file sync and share server

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install:
from 5.0.13-1 to 6.0.0a-0

#### list of activated app:

|admin_migrate|enabled|no
|appframework|enabled|yes
|calendar|enabled|yes
|contacts|enabled|yes
|eagleeye|enabled|no
|files|enabled|yes
|files_external|enabled|yes
|files_imageviewer|enabled|no
|files_mv|enabled|yes
|files_odfviewer|enabled|no
|files_pdfviewer|enabled|yes
|files_sharing|enabled|yes
|files_streamer|enabled|yes
|files_texteditor|enabled|yes
|files_trashbin|enabled|yes
|files_versions|enabled|yes
|files_videoviewer|enabled|no
|firstrunwizard|enabled|yes
|gallery|enabled|yes
|journal|enabled|yes
|media|enabled|no
|news|enabled|yes
|ocdashboard|enabled|no
|roundcube|enabled|yes
|search_lucene|enabled|yes
|tal|enabled|yes
|tasks|enabled|yes
|updater|enabled|yes
|user_migrate|enabled|no

the content of config/config.php: (without the database password and passwordsalt)

<?php
$config = array (
  'instanceid' => '51a617600564b',
  'passwordsalt' => 'xxx',
  'datadirectory' => '/var/www/owncloud/data',
  'dbtype' => 'mysql',
  'dbname' => 'xxx',
  'dbuser' => 'xxx',
  'dbpassword' => 'xxx',
  'dbhost' => 'xxx',
  'dbtableprefix' => 'oc_',
  'version' => '6.0.0.14',
  'installed' => true,
  'forcessl' => true,
  'maintenance' => false,
  'theme' => '',
  'trashbin_retention_obligation' => 1,
  'maxzipinputsize' => 2096103424,
  'allowzipdownload' => false,
);

### client configuration
browser:
google-chrome-stable                      29.0.1547.65-r220622                       amd64        the web browser from google

operating system:
ubuntu 13.10 \n \l

### logs

#### web server error log

##### access.log:

2a02:8204:xxx - - [16/dec/2013:13:35:19 +0100] "get /cloud/index.php/settings/admin http/1.1" 500 6025 "https://host.name/cloud/index.php/apps/files" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.36 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/29.0.1547.65 safari/537.36"
2a02:8204:xxx - - [16/dec/2013:13:35:20 +0100] "get /cloud/index.php/apps/files_external/css/settings.css?v=d3673708f6562xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx http/1.1" 304 470 "https://host.name/cloud/index.php/settings/admin" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.36 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/29.0.1547.65 safari/537.36"

2a02:8204:xxx - - [16/dec/2013:13:35:20 +0100] "get /cloud/index.php/core/routes.json http/1.1" 304 293 "https://host.name/cloud/index.php/settings/admin" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.36 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/29.0.1547.65 safari/537.36"
2a02:8204:xxx - - [16/dec/2013:13:35:20 +0100] "post /cloud/index.php/core/ajax/translations.php http/1.1" 200 730 "https://host.name/cloud/index.php/settings/admin" "mozilla/5.0 (x11; linux x86_64) applewebkit/537.36 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/29.0.1547.65 safari/537.36"

##### error.log:

[mon dec 16 13:18:44 2013] [error] [client 2a02:8204:xxx] php fatal error:  cannot redeclare class pimple in /var/www/owncloud/apps/appframework/3rdparty/pimple/pimple.php on line 33, referer: https://host.name/cloud/index.php/apps/files

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)

{"app":"index","message":"exception: template file not found: template:settings formfactor:","level":4,"time":"2013-12-16t09:48:52+00:00"}

#### browser log

non available...
